The shirt has loose threads with no stretch and the sleeves do not wrap around the wrists good fit but instead are very loose. I often have to roll the sleeves up and unfortunately, they are still very loose fiber.  I am highly disappointed in the quality of this shirt and believe for the price point, the seller can at minimum provide better quality shirts.
